reviewText: I have been using this coffee maker for 6 months now and it still works perfectly. The coffee tastes great and it heats up really fast. The build quality feels solid and the machine is very easy to clean.
summary: Excellent coffee maker, heats up fast

reviewText: Bought this for my office and everyone loves it. Makes a consistent cup every time. A bit loud when it starts but that goes away after 30 seconds. Would definitely recommend for small offices.
The machine stopped working after 3 months. Customer service was helpful and sent a replacement but it was disappointing for the price. The replacement has been working fine for 2 months now.
summary: Broke after 3 months, replacement sent quickly

reviewText: Very easy to set up. The instructions are clear and the first cup was ready in under 5 minutes. My only complaint is the water reservoir could be larger — I have to refill it every 2 cups.
summary: Easy setup but small water tank

reviewText: Not suitable for beginners. The settings are confusing and there is no clear guide in the box. I had to watch YouTube videos to understand how to use it properly. Once you figure it out the coffee is decent.
Perfect for beginners! Very intuitive interface. One button operation and you get a hot cup in 2 minutes. I am new to coffee machines and this was a breeze to use.
The machine is very noisy. It woke up my baby every morning. The coffee quality is fine but I ended up returning it because of the noise.
I use this daily. It has been 2 years and it still works like new. Very durable product. I also love that it is easy to clean — the parts are dishwasher safe.
summary: Durable and easy to clean after 2 years
